entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Nicolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:10 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nicolet 6:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -10.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -12.2°C
Wind: S 22 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning near noon. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
